description: This table contains the list of external imaging procedures performed on the patient and entered in the Comparison Studies activity. It includes the procedure (EAP) ID, facility, exam date, and comments.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EXT_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique procedure ID of the external procedure that is used for comparison studies. External procedures do not have an order signed in Epic (ORD), nor a specific audit in the patient's chart (CHT).

columns.name: EXT_PROC_DATE
columns.description: The performed date of the external procedure that used for comparison studies.

columns.name: EXT_PROC_CMT
columns.description: Comments entered for an external procedure used for comparison studies.

columns.name: EXT_PROC_DEL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether an external procedure (used for comparison studies) has been deleted. 'Y' indicates the external procedure has been deleted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: EXT_PROC_LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the facility where an external procedure used for comparison studies was performed.
